name: Bar Break In
description:
In this experience, you can explore an area, watching the shopkeepers do their thing. However, your character needs to find their way under the bar, and it's up to you to work out how!

Controls: 

WASD to control the Character

C to crouch

E to interact

Escape to access the pause menu

Download instructions:

For this game, simply download the zip, extract it, and play the 'Bar Break In.Exe' application.
